com.gdx.game.controller.entities

Class BallController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gdx.game.controller.entities.EntityController
      • com.gdx.game.controller.entities.BallController

  • public class BallController
extends EntityController
    This class is used to control ball movements and status. This represents the player.

    • Method Summary
